remarks: Part of proof of Lemma E in [Crawley] p. 113.  Utility lemma. ` D ` represents s_2.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Nov-2012.)
statement:
cdlemeda.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemeda.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemeda.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdlemeda.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemeda.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemeda.d $e |- D = ( ( R .\/ S ) ./\ W ) $.
cdlemedb.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdlemedb $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( R e. A /\ S e. A ) ) -> D e. B ) $.
